text:
November 29, 1956
Mr* Floyde E* Brooker
Executive Secretary
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street, Northwest
Washington 6, D* C.
Dear Floyde:
Excellent plan outlined in your November 20 memo to DAVI .members,
hope many requests come in, and hope it reached people in time,
know how this goes, so we can give it a plug if it goes over*
Best regards.
HJSsdfc
Harry J* Skornia
Executive Director
Certainly
I'd like to
